disableFancy.description:
<align center>(Affects only you)</align>
Simplifies system-taxing visual effects.

muteMusic.description:
<align center>(Affects only you)</align>
Disables all music.

allowClientRuleChange.description:
<align center>(For online play)</align>
Allows non-hosts to change the game rules.

physicsPatchEnabled.description: Enables quicker acceleration and deceleration for all players.

reserveBoxEnabled.description: Allows Mario and Luigi to store an item in the reserve box and use it later.

startWithMushroom.description: Allows each player to start in the super state at the start of each match.

splitScreenStyle.description:
<align center>(For local play)</align>
Control whether you can see more horizontally or vertically.

lives.description: How many lives each player should start with, if enabled.

starsToWin.description: The number of stars needed to win the game.

itemsType.description: What types of items should be available from collecting coins.

coinsForItem.description: How many coins a player needs to collect in order to get an item.

timeLimit.description: The maximum length of one game. In a time out, the leading player is awarded the win.

bannedCharacters.description: Anybody playing as a banned character will be transformed into another random character at the start of a match.

localMultiplayer.description: Face off against one other player in a split-screen battle!

onlineMultiplayer.description: Duke it out online with up to ten players! Additional setup is required.

recon.description: Look around the levels on your own.

help.main:
You can find instructions on how to use the online features at:

<color lightblue>https://mrdoublea232.github.io/battle</color>

modeDescriptions.-1: View all the available levels across all modes.
modeDescriptions.0: The original SMBX 1.3 battle mode - battle it out with limited lives!
modeDescriptions.1: The New Super Mario Bros. versus mode - collect stars or steal them from your opponents!
modeDescriptions.2: Hold the stone for as long as possible! It'll slow you down, but you need the points to win!
modeDescriptions.3: Who knows what'll happen? The rules here are entirely up to the level creator!
